drushti snayuwa thulin gamanganna drushyaya sangnya molaye adala prasadeshakara langawimen pasu ema sangnyawanhi gabwa athi penimata adala sangnya molaya wisin pariwarthanayakara dakina wasthuwa kumak dayi watahaganimata samathwe.me watahaganimata athinrina wa ya sanjananaya sambandhawe.sabawinma mehi di athinriyalata ya sanjananaya sambandhawanuye abhyananthara madhyatha molaye sruju krinayakariwaya samangada ese nathi nam molayehi drushyu sanjananayata sambandha kotasa samangadayi manowidyanagnyayin athara danata digu kalaka patan kathikawathak athiwa thibe.eheth me dakwa eeta nishchitha wisandumak soya ganimata owun apohosathwa sitinabawa heliwe.yam heyakin drushy athindyariya sanjananaya samanga sambandhawanuye abhyawanthara madhyaba molaya nam jiwawidyathmaka labana penime hakiyawa thibime athi wadagathkamak eeta nothibiya yuthuya.namudu saba thathwaya nam yamekuta drushyana athinri thi ya sanjanana hakiyawa labimata jiwawidyayathmaka penima thibima athyathawashyu sadhakayak bawayi.me hethuwa nisa mita sambandhawanuye abhyenthara madhyawa mola wyudhahaye krieyakarithwaya nowa molaye penimata adala kotasabawa thawath widyathmaka piliganimaki.molaye penimata adala kotasa drushyama athinriwida ya sanjananaya samanga sambandha wanne nam bhauthika asata adalawana wiwidha simakari sadhaka eetada adalawiyayuthuya.
